definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
howling wind and torrential rain (idiom)/(fig.) difficult, dangerous situation

sentences.english: Characteristic of 060714 rainfall and floodwater is unfrequent in many rainfall and floodwater of the Helan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 其特性在賀蘭山暴雨洪水中是歷次上少見的。

sentences.english: Summer afternoons are frequently accompanied by thunderstorms.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的午後經常伴有雷暴雨。

sentences.english: The dirt roads were, at times, impassible because of the heavy tropical rains.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，熱帶暴雨讓泥路無法行走。

sentences.english: In the raging storm the ship's masts were carried away.
sentences.chinese: 在狂風暴雨中，船桅被颳走了。

sentences.english: Nearly 3 weeks of continuous heavy rains and floods in eastern Australia, calamity-ridden.
sentences.chinese: 連續近3周的暴雨和洪水使澳大利亞東部災難深重。

sentences.english: The summer rainstorm was also one of the meteorological disasters which reduce the production of large cherry.
sentences.chinese: 夏季暴雨也是影響大櫻桃生產的氣象災害之一。

sentences.english: Rain-triggered flood submerges parts of Dazhou.
sentences.chinese: 四川達州遭暴雨襲擊，洪水漫城。

sentences.english: Floodwaters are still rising after this week's heavy downpours across parts of Ohio .
sentences.chinese: 俄亥俄州部分地區本週連降暴雨，洪水仍在不斷上漲。

sentences.english: Owing to the rain, the baseball game was interrupted.
sentences.chinese: 由於暴雨，那場棒球比賽被中斷了。

sentences.english: They called off the football match because of a severe thunderstorm.
sentences.chinese: 因爲暴雨太大了，他們把橄欖球賽取消了。

sentences.english: Fifteen rainstorm warnings have been issued by Hubei authorities.
sentences.chinese: 湖北當局已發出十五條暴雨警告。
你是否畏懼暴雨的抽打？

sentences.english: I feel a thunderstorm is brewing. Do you see the sheet-lightning there?
sentences.chinese: 恐怕暴雨即將來臨，您看見那邊打閃了嗎？

sentences.english: At least 70 dead, millions affected in S China rainstorms .
sentences.chinese: 江西遭受暴雨襲擊，至少70人死亡，數百萬人受災。

sentences.english: Relentless, dangerous thunderstorms and heavy rains continued to slow relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 無情的是，危險的雷電和暴雨繼續減慢了救災工作。

sentences.english: Never shelter under a tree during thunder- storms.
sentences.chinese: 雷暴雨時，千萬不能到樹下去躲雨。

definition: a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
howling wind and torrential rain (idiom)/(fig.) difficult, dangerous situation
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
